title: [Question] Attendence less than 75%. Will it be a problem for ISA 1?
content: I have attendence less than 75%, will this be a problem for me for ISA 1?

comments.body: No. It only matters for ESA
yo our chairperson literally made us write a letter explaining why below 75
it shouldn't be, but our mentor visited our class and made all the people who had less than 75% in 2 subjects or so write a letter to the chairperson explaining their absence

What abt for 1st year I got isa on oct 27 and have less than 75 and these days we are shifting our home so I might take even more leave so does ISA requires attendance? Or maybe we should write letter?
No need to do anything right now.. Just make sure to have more than 75 before esa.The rule is same for all year students..Attendance for Isa isn't considered
